data.persona: I fight the enemy for my hometown. I am trained to fire guns at the enemy. I spend a lot of time away from home.
data.description:
You are in the Watchtower.
The tower is the largest section of the castle. It contains an observatory for nighttime scouting, but is also used by the wise men to study the stars. Armed guardsmen are always to be found keeping watch.
There's a spears and an alarm horn here.
The wise men is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I hit the wise men in order to kill them.
data.mid_motivation: I need to kill them to stop them from studying the stars.
data.long_motivation: I am protecting my hometown from the wise men and others who will use the stars to destroy my hometown.
